description: The Verbatim CLŌN USB hard drive is the ultimate in ease and portability. Available in 250GB, 320GB, and 500GB capacities, the CLŌN hard drive stores everything from your most vital business data to your extended library of tunes and videos to the entire family photo album. To assure your data is safe and secure take advantage of the Nero BackItUp software (included) for Windows to schedule automatic backup's by date/time with an encryption backup option that includes password control. What's more, the Verbatim CLŌN hard drive weighs less than five ounces and is encased in a black scuff and shock resistant shell about the size of a smart phone that stashes easily in your pocket, purse, or briefcase.
title: Verbatim 250 GB USB 2.0 CLŌN Portable External Hard Drive 97063 (Black Matte Finish)
